about_the_game:
Furry Empire is a match-three game with visual novel elements in which you take on the role of a young emperor who has just received this title. Unfortunately, he doesn't have much time to enjoy it - the Demon King is gathering forces to destroy the world, so our hero needs a bigger army, more resources and more power.

To get everything he needs, our hero must defeat the four "Queens of the North" to get their armies and resources. And that's where our story begins!

Ember, the Sword of Wildfire - a powerful warrior who likes nothing but drinking, fighting and eating. She will crush you before you can make your first move!

Lapis, Lady of Magic - a shy beauty of the dragon race who, like you, has only recently gained her position. Despite her inexperience in all things social, she is one of the most powerful mages today!

Eyre, the Master of All Winds - a cunning and playful archer. No one can catch her or keep up with her speed, but she never runs and always plays with her opponents before killing them.

Icelyn, the Cold Wisdom - a true leader of her nation, the wisest person in the whole empire. Like her powers, her character is very cold, you'd be lucky to see her smile. If you try to approach her without permission - your body will be immediately imprisoned in ice.

content_descriptors.notes:
Nudity and Sexual Content which is not suitable for all audiences. Full frontal nudity, sex acts.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Furry Empire is a match-three game with visual novel elements in which you take on the role of a young emperor who has just received this title. Unfortunately, he doesn't have much time to enjoy it - the Demon King is gathering forces to destroy the world, so our hero needs a bigger army, more resources and more power.

To get everything he needs, our hero must defeat the four "Queens of the North" to get their armies and resources. And that's where our story begins!

Ember, the Sword of Wildfire - a powerful warrior who likes nothing but drinking, fighting and eating. She will crush you before you can make your first move!

Lapis, Lady of Magic - a shy beauty of the dragon race who, like you, has only recently gained her position. Despite her inexperience in all things social, she is one of the most powerful mages today!

Eyre, the Master of All Winds - a cunning and playful archer. No one can catch her or keep up with her speed, but she never runs and always plays with her opponents before killing them.

Icelyn, the Cold Wisdom - a true leader of her nation, the wisest person in the whole empire. Like her powers, her character is very cold, you'd be lucky to see her smile. If you try to approach her without permission - your body will be immediately imprisoned in ice.
name: Furry Empire ⚔️

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: The young and mighty Emperor needs power for the upcoming war against the evil forces. To get that power, he must conquer four powerful queens - both their lands and their hearts.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
